resources.string: We have the most advanced Vending Machines worldwide.
Purchase products ranging from food to pharmacy by adding items to cart.

SuperVend, a promising local startup which specializes in mega vending machines is also aiming to disrupt the retailing industry. Our companyâ€™s business model is to strategically position their mega vending machines (which are about the size of a 40 feet shipping containers) all over Singapore. Our idea is to bring supermarket nearer to customers 24/7 and to encourage social distancing due to the current raging COVID-19 pandemic. The goal of our company is to have a SuperVend vending machine installed within every 100 meters apart in each populated district by 2022.

string-array.name: item_descriptions
string-array.item: Milo with ACTIV-GO gives you the energy to go further. Contains b vitamins which contribute to the reduction of tiredness and fatigue.
Specially mixed flour for premium noodles is used to bring a chewy texture to the noodles.
Fudgy chunks of brownie goodness mixed into dark and rich chocolate ice cream. Sounds like a dream.
Made from quality meat Beef Cubes is a 100-Percent Halal product that is suitable for all consumer groups.
One of the sweetest apples with 16~18% sugar with a higher glucose/fructose content than most apples.

string-array.name: milo_instant_mix_comment
string-array.item: Bought it for my kids. They loved it.

string-array.name: instant_noodles_comment
string-array.item: Perfect. I can purchase 10 at once.
I love eating them while watching YouTube. Not healthy though. Eat sparingly.

string-array.name: ice_cream_comment
string-array.item: Totally savoured it. I mean, who doesn't like ice cream, right? It tastes the best after lunch and dinner.

string-array.name: beef_cubes_comment
string-array.item: Definitely the choice for all families.
My mother loves to cook these beef cubes when I was little. Enjoyed them. Glad to find them again.

string-array.name: fuji_apples_comment
string-array.item: I love these apples so much. They are fresh and very much addictive.
I agree with Funny. I got so addicted that I ate 2 apples for breakfast, 4 apples for lunch and 3 apples for dinner. Definitely recommended!
